description.@en: With a few drops of mineral oil, turpentine and a bit of that “ol’ black magic”, you turn any normal ointment into a miracle liniment.

effect.@en: You treat the Alchemy Skill as a Common Skill. In addition, you may substitute Snake Venom in place of any needed reagent to alchemize consumables (as outlined under Materia Medica from the Hazards & Healing chapter in ZWEIHÄNDER and in Chapter 4: Liber Alchemiae). The only exception to this is when Wytchstone or its byproducts are required as regents.
